text: Black Sunday refers to a very bad dust storm that happened on April 14, 1935. The storm happened as part of the Dust Bowl. It was one of the worst dust storms in American history. It caused a lot of economic and agricultural damage. It is estimated to have moved 300 million tons of topsoil from the prairie area in the US.Black Blizzard, History Channel documentary. ==References== Category:Disasters in the 1930s Category:1935 in the United States Category:Natural disasters in the United States Category:20th century in Texas
